convlab.modules.usr.user module¶

class convlab.modules.usr.user.UserSimulator(nlu_model, policy, nlg_model)[source]¶

Bases: object

An aggregation of user simulator components.

init_response()[source]¶

Return a init response of the user.

init_session()[source]¶

Init the parameters for a new session by calling the init_session methods of policy component.

response(input, context=[])[source]¶

Generate the response of user. :param input: Preorder system output. The type is str if system.nlg is not None, else dict. :type input: str or dict

Returns:User response. If the nlg component is None, type(output) == dict, else str. action (dict): The dialog act of output. Note that if the nlg component is None, the output and action are
identical.

session_over (boolean): True to terminate session, else session continues. reward (float): The reward given by the user.
Return type:output (str or dict)
